name: Gielda Swiatowa
overview: Giełda Światowa is a turn based economic game for up to 5 players. The game allows to choose one of three goals - earn 100.000 $, survive on the market for three years, bring to bankrupt your opponents. Gameplay is all about goods stock exchange trading and making financial operations. Stock exchange trading includes 12 goods in 10 countries. Trading is done on the basis of buy cheap and sell expensive, plus pay as little as possible for shipping costs. Goods transport allows to choose between car, train, ship and airplane with insurance possibility. Each turn ends up with a summary, which includes tax expenses and a transport arrival summary. The game features advanced set of comparative statistics.
